title: How to unsubscribe from Yakaboo
description: Yakaboo is Ukraine's largest national book platform with over 3.5 million clients worldwide, offering over 200,000 books in 71 languages in paperback, ebook, and audiobook formats. To cancel your Yakaboo subscription, follow these steps:

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Email
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Yakaboo subscription via email, follow these steps:

*   Send an email to support@yakaboo.ua to request cancellation.
*   Ensure you send the email from the address associated with your Yakaboo account.
*   Wait for a confirmation email from Yakaboo support.
*   Check your email for any further instructions from Yakaboo.

steps_2.title: Manage Subscription via Website
steps_2.description:
To manage or verify your Yakaboo subscription via the website, follow these steps:

*   To manage subscriptions, log in to your account on the Yakaboo website.
*   Log in to your account on the Yakaboo website to verify cancellation, if possible.
*   Confirm that all personal data, including search and reading history, will be deleted.

seo_text: Learn how to easily cancel your Yakaboo subscription. Follow our step-by-step guide to unsubscribe from Yakaboo and manage your account preferences.
